0: When word of Dexter stars Michael C. Hall and Jennifer Carpenter ending their marriage broke, Julia Stiles was rumored to be the other woman whose box-like face lured Michael away. Hall while he was technically married because that excuse worked out so awesome for Angelina Jolie.
